trans-unit.source: Your Recovery Key allows you to login to your account even if you forget your password. Store it somewhere safe.
trans-unit.target: Your Recovery Key allows you to login to your account even if you forget your password. Store it somewhere safe.
trans-unit.note: Label to describe the 'Recovery Key' and its purpose.

trans-unit.source: This will log you out on all other active sessions except the current one. You will need to re-login to your other devices to continue using MEGA.
trans-unit.target: This will log you out on all other active sessions except the current one. You will need to re-login to your other devices to continue using MEGA.
trans-unit.note: Label to describe the "Session Management" option of the "Settings" section.
Label for any 'Warning' title, message, etc. - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
trans-unit.target: Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Two-Factor Authentication' in the security settings section.
Label for any link/button that shows how something works. Is used for example to show how the Two-Factor Authentication works - (String as short as possible).

Label of the button to copy the seed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Enter and confirm your new password and click save.
trans-unit.target: Enter and confirm your new password and click save.
trans-unit.note: Text to describe the change password process.
Label for any 'Export' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).
Placeholder text of the field to type the 6 digit code provided for the authenticator app to verify the Multi-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: After setting up your seed on your authenticator app enter the 6-digit code provided.
trans-unit.target: After setting up your seed on your authenticator app enter the 6-digit code provided.
trans-unit.note: Text to describe the step 2 to setup the Muti-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: 2. Confirm that it works by copying the 6-digit code generated by your authenticator app
trans-unit.target: 2. Confirm that it works by copying the 6-digit code generated by your authenticator app
trans-unit.note: Label for the step 2 to setup the Muti-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: 1. Scan or copy the seed directly into your authenticator app
trans-unit.target: 1. Scan or copy the seed directly into your authenticator app
trans-unit.note: Label for the step 1 to setup the Multi-Factor Authentication.
Label for the 'Two-Factor Authentication' section of the security settings.
